content:
Our weekly podcast on the markets, the economy and the world of business

DIGITAL DISRUPTION is coming to banking at last. Helen Joyce travels across Asia to see how fintechs like Ant Financial are transforming how people spend, save and invest their money, and asks whether traditional banks can catch up. Who will win the battle to be the bank of the future? And could having a bank in your pocket make your money safer? Runtime: 23 min 

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: suff. 名词后缀；形容词后缀
网络 小蚂蚁；天线(antenna)；白(adenine nucleotide translocator)
n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错

wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
v. 突袭；偷袭；突击搜捕；突然搜查
n. 抢劫；突然袭击；突击检查；突然搜查
网络 磁盘阵列(Redundant Array of Independent Disks)；磁碟阵列(Redundant Array of Inexpensive Disks)；独立磁盘冗余阵列
eg2: They carried out a bombing raid on enemy bases.
他们突然出击，轰炸了敌军的基地。
They were arrested during a dawn raid .
在一次清晨的突击搜查中，他们都被捕了。
Villages along the border are regularly raided.
边境附近的村庄经常遭受突袭。
a raiding party(= a group of soldiers, etc. that attack a place)
Many treasures were lost when the tombs were raided in the last century.
上世纪这些坟墓遭到偷盗，很多财宝都失踪了。
I caught him raiding the fridge again(= taking food from it) .
我撞见他又在扫荡冰箱里的食物。

Title: Tech’s raid on the banks
